testcase.name: User books a flight from Jakarta to Singapore
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Agoda Flights page.....................................passed When user selects departure city as "Jakarta"...............................passed And user selects destination city as "Singapore"............................passed And user selects tomorrow date..............................................passed And user clicks Search......................................................passed Then user filters AirAsia flight............................................passed And user selects the cheapest flight........................................passed Then verify selected price matches checkout price...........................passed And verify airline is "Indonesia AirAsia"...................................passed Then user fills contact details.............................................passed
